SANDUSKY, Ohio Cedar Point, which made national headlines last year when it increased employee pay to $20 per hour, is planning to reduce starting wages to $15 an hour this year.

articles.title: Air traffic control call reveals terror of American Airlines flight where passenger was subdued by coffee pot - The Independent
articles.description: ‘We’ve got four passengers now trying to contain this gentleman,’ pilot tells air traffic control
articles.content: An air traffic control call has been released of an American Airlines pilot speaking to ground staff as a passenger tried to enter the cockpit and was later subdued by a crew member using a coffee po… [+4023 chars]
